contest-event.event-date:
May 26, 1956 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Suite in Bb [Jacob] Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:31 p.m. May 10, 2013, 9:04 p.m. 1 City of Birmingham Band Cyril Yorath 2 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth 3 Eccles Borough Band G. Millor 4 Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock Unknown Result ATM Works Band Norman Jones Unknown Result Beswick Prize Albert Risby Unknown Result Bolsover Colliery S. Jennings Unknown Result Finedon Old Prize Band A. G. Remington Unknown Result Prince-Smith and Stells Silver Band Reubon Lightfoot Unknown Result Thoresby Colliery William Appleton
